title: HitmanPro Alert 3.1.0 Build 340 with CryptoCuard + Serial Patch
description:
HitmanPro Alert 3.1.0 Build 340 with CryptoCuard + Serial Patch Crack
Surfrigh HitmanPro Alertt is a really trust lightweight application able to monitor your browser activity and detect poterntial threats that may comprise system security.


The tool was specifically built to add an extra layer of security to your system, in order to protect yopu whenever you shop on the internet or perform online banking operations. It offwers Real-Time PC Protection against software exploits, Drive-By Downloads, Crypto-Ransomware, Online Fraud and Identidy Theft.


Intuitive interface and malware scans

The Tool sports an attractive and clear-cut interface and offers to perform a malware scan rigjht after installation, in order to get the security assessment of your computer.



Scan results show the name, full path of infected file of each threats, as well as apply an action to the current file or all of them. The log details can be saved to file for later aximination.



Safe browsing and exploit mitigatiomn

When it comes to safe bnrowsing, HitmanPro Alert protects your activities surrounding online banking, shopping or web mail. It offers support for m,any browsers as Internet Exploer, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Firefox, Google Chrome, Maxthon, Comodo Dragon, Pale Moon, Tor Browser Bundle, Avant Browser, Spark Browser, SRWare Iron and Yandex Browser.


The feature dedicated to exploit mitigation prevents several â€œThird-Party applicationsâ€ from current and future vulnerabillity attacks like Java, VLC Media Player, Windows Media Player, DivX, Windows Media Center, Wordpad and Adobe Flash Player. Currently running processes that arenâ€™t supported by HitmanPro Alert are shown in another panel, so you can at least be aware of risks.


Vaccination, CryptoGuard and Webcam Notifier

The software application sports additional tools to reduce the risk of malware infections. For instance, it can stop Sandbox-Adware and Malware by making the computer look like it belongs to a virus researcher, block Crypto-Ransomweare (like CryptoLocker) by keeping local and shared files safe or warn you when your webcam was selently turned on to watch you.


Keystroke Encryption, Process Protection, Network Lockdown and USB Blocker

Moreover, the program is able to encrypt all keystrokes to prevent keyloggers from hijacking your passwords, private messages and other sensitive information, prevent malware from infecting the main executable of a trusted procces (e.g. Anti-Virus), stop backdoor traffic by locking down the network and block malicvious USB devices that pose as a keyboard.


Any of these modules can be quickly enabled or disabled with a simple one click. On the other hand, although HitmanPro Alert offers an advanced interface mode for experienced users, it doesnâ€™t provide customization preferencves for each protection component (perhaps for the sake of simplicity).
